testcase.classname: Sign in and Log in Testing
testcase.name: Positive Register Testing
testcase.system-out: Given Homepage login........................................................passed And Verify homepage.........................................................passed Given Sees sign in and clicks...............................................passed And Clicks Register your account because your does not have an account......passed And Sees that you are on the Register page..................................passed And Enters a string value in the First name box.............................passed And Enters a string value in the Last name box..............................passed And Selects date from Date of birth field...................................passed And Enters string and valid value in the Street box.........................passed And Enters valid value in Postal code.......................................passed And Enters string value in the City box.....................................passed And Enters string in the State box..........................................passed And Selects a country from the country field................................passed And Enters valid value in the phone box.....................................passed And Enters string and valid value in Email box..............................passed And The password box is filled in according to the criteria.................passed And Clicks on the Register box..............................................passed Then Should be redirected to the login page.................................passed

testcase.classname: Sign in and Log in Testing
testcase.name: Positive Login Testing
testcase.system-out: Given Homepage login........................................................passed And Verify homepage.........................................................passed Given Clicks sign in to log in..............................................passed And Sees that you are on the Login page.....................................passed And Enters string and valid value in the Email address box..................passed And Fill in the password box................................................passed And Clicks on the Login box.................................................passed Then Verifies that you have successfully opened your account................passed

testcase.name: The user logs in and purchases the product.
testcase.system-out: Given Homepage login........................................................passed And Verify homepage.........................................................passed Given A product is randomly selected from the homepage......................passed And Click the Add to Cart button............................................passed And Click on the cart to purchase the added product.........................passed And They see the product they selected in the cart..........................passed And Click the Proceed to Checkout button....................................passed And The session account is verified. You are prompted to proceed to the payment screen.passed And The Billing Address fields appear to be filled in, and you can proceed..passed And Bank transfer payment method is selected................................passed And Enter the bank name.....................................................passed And Enter account name......................................................passed And Enter account number....................................................passed Then Payment successfully verified..........................................passed

testcase.name: Checkout Payment API
